channel.title: Help With My Run.Bat!
channel.description:
Client I'm Using From Enigma: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/61771932/Client.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/61771932/Client.rar[/url]
Run.bat [code]@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
I think the error has to do with the Jframe because their is only a Jframe.class but not a Jframe.java
Error [code]Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Anyone help me or add me on msn and help? Vortexscape@hotmail.com, please. :\ That's the path for my java which works on other client's but i don't know why this one wont work.

item.title: Help With My Run.Bat!
item.dc:creator: @All_Time_Low All Time Low
item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

Yeah i had a friend on msn who was online and he said it was because my main class wasn’t set or something so he fixed it for me, he went offline but now i don’t know where to put my ip in source it like doesn’t have a spot to put it in. :s

EDIT: Nevermind i forgot i’m not at home and haven’t portforwarded where im at atm i just portforwarded and everything’s solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With My Run.Bat!
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

Hey dude theres a couple problems with your run.bat
use one like this… :

@echo off title Client cd ./locandclass/ START java -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
it saying START java basically runs java for 32 bit or 64 bit.
only use "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\java.exe" for when it doesn’t work on rare occurances. for 64 bit (depending on your client)

Now, getting to your error:

its saying that because you have not directed it to your all of your classfiles (besides sign)
so in this case, what you predicted is correct
no jframe = no workable client

Read full topic
